rules.natural: If the plant extract study receives research funding, then the research project is successful
Either the plant extract study receives research funding or the ethics committee approves the plant extract study
Either research findings are peer-reviewed or, if the research project is not successful, then a research paper is not published
If the funding grant is renewed, then the research project is successful
Either the funding grant is renewed or a novel compound is discovered
If the research team hires a biochemist, then should a novel compound be discovered, the research project becomes successful
Either the research team hires a biochemist or the research team contracts an external laboratory
If the research team contracts an external laboratory, then when a novel compound is discovered, the research project is successful
If the research period is extended, then either the project timeline is delayed or the research project is successful
If the ethics committee approves the plant extract study, then the plant compound is synthesized into an antiviral drug
If the extraction method is optimized, then provided that the plant compound is tested on human cells, the clinical trial progresses
Either the extraction method is optimized or the cultivation technique is improved
If the cultivation technique is improved, then the purification process is enhanced
If the bioactive molecule is patented, then the research project is successful
If a patent application is filed, then the bioactive molecule is patented
If the patent decision is appealed, then the patent claim is not rejected
If the clinical trial progresses, then the research project is successful
If the plant compound is synthesized into an antiviral drug, then the plant compound is tested on human cells
If the plant compound is synthesized into an antiviral drug, then the plant compound is manufactured
If the plant compound is manufactured, then the clinical trial progresses
If the electron microscope is operational, then the research project is successful
If the spectrometry device is functional, then the research project is successful
If laboratory equipment is available, then either the electron microscope is operational or the spectrometry device is functional
If it is not the case that either experimental data is validated or research findings are not peer-reviewed, then study results are retracted
If it is not the case that either experimental data is validated or research findings are not peer-reviewed, then study results are not retracted
If it is not true that when a novel compound is discovered then a patent application is filed, then the patent claim is rejected
If it is not true that when the purification process is enhanced then the plant compound being tested on human cells leads to clinical trial progression, then quality control fails
If the research project is not successful, then a research paper is published

facts.natural: The project timeline is not delayed
